name: Taco Salad II
author: Susan
summary: This recipe is a favorite at all gatherings.  It has been passed down in our family for three generations. There is one friend of the family who comes to our gatherings specifically for this dish.  It is easy to make and oh so delicious.
ingredients: 1 head iceberg lettuce - rinsed, dried, and shredded
3 cups shredded Cheddar-Monterey Jack cheese blend
directions: Place hamburger in a large, deep skillet
Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown and drain
Add   mix and prepare as directed by package
In a large bowl, combine the lettuce, onions, bell pepper, cheese, beef, tomatoes and tortilla chips
Add enough dressing to coat, mix well and refrigerate overnight
